title: Login Status: Authenticating...
body: Cant login... everytime I try to get into league it just doesn't go through it stops once I hit enter and just acts like its loading something....

replies.body: yeah let me know if you find a fix, i'm having the same problem. the connection issue support page didn't help me.
I'm experiencing the same problem. If it does say anything except "Authenticating" (which takes several minutes) I get an Error message.
yeah I get the error message but It takes like 5-10 mins for it to actualy show up

It sounds like your connection is struggling to reach the authentication server, so it never gets a chance to check your login info.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
